thread.title: Schumer: If a Democrat Said What Trump Did About Putin, GOP Would ‘Be Howling at the Moon’
thread.title_full: Schumer: If a Democrat Said What Trump Did About Putin, GOP Would ‘Be Howling at the Moon’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Schumer: If a Democrat Said What Trump Did About Putin, GOP Would ‘Be Howling at the Moon’
text:
Schumer: If a Democrat Said What Trump Did About Putin, GOP Would ‘Be Howling at the Moon’ by Josh Feldman | 5:33   video 
Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer scolded his Republican colleagues on the Senate floor today over their reaction to President Trump ‘s remarks about Russia and Vladimir Putin . 
He was disturbed by Trump appearing to call Russia and the U.S. “morally equivalent” and said, “Can you imagine if a Democrat had said that? Every one of these seats would be filled with people decrying that kind of moral equivalence.” 
He asked his GOP colleagues, “Come on! Where are you? You know if a Democrat said it, you’d be just howling at the moon. Rightfully so.” 
However, Schumer did go on to give some Republican leaders credit for voicing their disagreement with the president on this matter. 
Watch above, via C-SPAN 2. 
[ image via screengrab ]
